name: Servotronics, Inc. v. Rolls-Royce PLC
question: Does 28 U.S.C. § 1782(a) authorize a district court to render assistance in discovery for use in a foreign or international tribunal?
description: A case in which the Court will decide whether a district court’s discretion to render assistance in gathering evidence for use in “a foreign or international tribunal” encompasses private commercial arbitral tribunals.
